Sencast
  • Primary Production
  • View page source

Primary Production

The Primary Production processor is an implementation of T.Soomets et al. 2019 in order to derive primary production from Satellite images.

processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.Fpar(z, q0par, M)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.M(qpar0, Cchl, Kpar)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.PP(z, qpar0, Cchl, Kpar)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.PhytoplanktonToChlorophyll(ph)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.Qstarpar(z, q0par, Cchl)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.absorption(Cchl)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.datetomonth(date)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.pp_trapezoidal_numerical_integration(zvals, qpar0, Cchl, KdMorel)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.process(env, params, l1product_path, l2product_files, out_path)

Apply Primary Production adapter. 1. Calculates primary production for Chl and KD

Parameters

env

Dictionary of environment parameters, loaded from input file

params

Dictionary of parameters, loaded from input file

l1product_path

unused

l2product_files

Dictionary of Level 2 product files created by processors

out_path

unused

processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.q0par(z, qpar0, Cchl, Kpar)
processors.primaryproduction.primaryproduction.qpar0_lookup(month, matrix)
